name: Food Truck Rush
description:
Food Truck Rush - An exciting game with a unique combination of driving and serving food.

It’s time to ditch the job and start your own business! It's going to be a chaotic but fun ride, as you begin to spread the magic of your Food Truck all over the city. Invest in different food trucks, drive to the destination, serve a stream of customers, and become an iconic fixture in your city!

With 75 super engaging levels, you will be left wanting for more. Drive across the city, participate in fun fests, and make sure your customers don’t run out of patience.

A game which will put your driving and management skills to test! Fly high and make your dream come true!

Download Food Truck Rush @Games2Win from Apple App Store and let the fun begin!

Food Truck Rush Features:
- 75 fun-filled driving and serving levels
- 4 different food trucks with upgrades
- 4 beautiful city areas to explore
- Realistic driving mechanics
- 3 different camera views

Games2win is a fun company that believes in creating amazing and enjoyable games for all ages. We have over 800+ proprietary games that are available both online and on mobile. Some of our smash hit games are Car Driving & Parking School, Race to White House 3D, High School Romance, Star Fashion Designer, Friends Forever and Fab Tattoo Design Studio. Currently, our company boasts of more than 100 million app downloads and 9 million gamers a month. And this is just the beginning!
